Pandaka：1．PandakaA monk，friend of Kapila，who lived in a village near Kosambī．He was found guilty of having taken what did not belong to him and also of unchastity．Vin．iii．67．

2．PandakaA Yakkha of the Himālaya region．He，his wife Hāritā，and his five hundred sons，becamesotāpannas whenMajjhantika preached toAravāla．Mhv．xii．21．
